title: ML: Calculate Precision and Recall
story: Precision: of positive predictions, how many are correct? Recall: of actual positives, how many did we catch?
instructions: Calculate precision and recall. Given TP=3, FP=1, FN=2. Print precision rounded to 2 decimals, then recall rounded to 2 decimals (2 lines).
starterCode:
import numpy as np

TP = 3  # True Positives
FP = 1  # False Positives  
FN = 2  # False Negatives

# Precision = TP / (TP + FP)
precision = TP / (TP + FP)

# Recall = TP / (TP + FN)
recall = TP / (TP + FN)

print(round(precision, 2))
print(round(recall, 2))
